corse.title: Master in Automobile Engineering
corse.titlePera: Masters in Automobile Engineering is a two years course spanning over four semesters. The course is designed to enable the graduate engineers with appropriate background to specialize their careers towards automotive engineering. The course also covers the main domain of vehicle such as chassis, body, drive train, safety, driver assistance systems and others. For a better learning experience, students are exposed to case studies and problem based learning, brainstorming, written tests, computer simulation, group discussions, industrial training seminars and projects. The course offers specialised knowledge of industrial design approaches and research topics with regard to real world vehicle requirements, market development and legislative constraints.
corse.programOutcomesPera: Automobile Engineers have job opportunities in various fields like automobile maintenance and service, production, research & development and transport departments. With the advent of E-Mobility (e-Bikes, Electric car) a lot of opportunities are accessible for these graduates after completing B.Tech in Automobile Engineering. The students who complete the course successfully can join modern automobile industries like Volvo, Ashok Leyland, Telco, Ford, Hyundai, Maruti, etc. They can also become entrepreneurs by operating service centres for automobiles.

programOutcomesImages.name: Service Advisor and Works Manager in Dealerships

corse.eligibilityCriteria: Graduate in Engineering with Automobile  Engineering.

laboratories.title: Automobile Engine Lab
laboratories.subTitle: Equipped with
laboratories.pera: SI Engine Test Bench/CI Engine Test Bench/4 Stroke Diesel Engine/4 Stroke Diesel Engine/SI Engine Ignition

laboratories.title: Automobile System Lab

corse.title: Master in Civil (Transportation Engineering)
corse.titlePera: Masters in Civil Engineering is a two years course spanning over four semesters. It offers specialization in Transportation engineering. Transportation engineering aims to get expertise in the technology and scientific principles of planning, functional design, operation and management of facilities for any mode of transportation in order to provide for the safe, efficient, rapid, comfortable, convenient, economical and environmentally compatible movement of people and goods transport. The course offers opportunity to make the career in the areas of design, development & implementation.
corse.programOutcomesPera: To demonstrate skill for planning, design, construction and maintenance of transportation projects./To assess environmental and its allied issues to the construction of the transportation projects/To demonstrate skills to use modern engineering tools, software and equipment’s to analyze problems and evolve solutions./To enhance communication skills and successfully apply research aptitude among students to R &D activities and consultancy works./To gain the insights knowledge about various simulation techniques and CAD softwares.
corse.eligibilityCriteria: Graduate in Engineering with Automobile  Engineering.

laboratories.title: Highway Engineering
laboratories.subTitle: Equipped with
laboratories.pera: California Bearing Ratio Test/Aggregate Impact Test/Ductility Test/Los Angeles Test/Flash & Fire Apparatus

corse.title: Master in Computer Engineering
corse.titlePera: Masters in Computer Engineering is a two years course spanning over four semesters. The aim of this course is to focus in the area of research, development, designing, modifying and managing the software programs. Students should finish their masters program, well prepared to work in the computer industry, having studied both the theory and practical side of this ever expanding field. The course offers secure and effective operation of all computer systems, software applications, and other hardware & software components. Computer engineering offers varied career paths in both hardware engineering and software development, each which drive computing advances in industries ranging from aerospace to healthcare.
corse.programOutcomesPera: Professional Skills: The ability to understand, analyze and develop software in the areas related to system software, multimedia, web design, big data analytics, networking and algorithms for efficient design of computer based systems of varying complexities. Problem Solving Skills: The ability to apply standard practices and strategies in software project development using open-ended programming environments to deliver a quality product for business success. Research Skills: The ability to study, experiment, interpret, analyze and explore the solutions to the engineering problems which are effective, efficient, optimized and feasible.
corse.eligibilityCriteria: Graduate in Engineering with Automobile  Engineering.

corse.title: Master in Electrical Engineering
corse.titlePera: Masters in Electrical Engineering is a two years course spanning over four semesters. The aim of the course is to focus on transmission, electrification and generation of electricity in the field of electrical engineering. The course offers wide selection among different areas like wireless communication, power systems and energy conversion.
corse.programOutcomesPera: Ability to apply the enhanced knowledge in advanced technologies for modelling, Analyzing and solving contemporary issues in power sector with a global perspective. Ability to critically analyze and carry out detailed investigation on multifaceted complex Problem sinarea of Power Systems and envisage advanced research in thrust areas. Ability to develop and utilize modern tools for modelling, analyzing and solving various Engineering problems related to Power Systems. Ability to work in a team of engineers/ researchers with mutual understandings to take unsophisticated challenges, in the field of Power Systems, lead and motivate the group to inculcate multidisciplinary and collaborative approach.

corse.title: Master in Electronics and Communication Engineering
corse.titlePera: Masters in Electronics & Communication Engineering is a two years course spanning over four semesters. The course aims to form a post graduate with advanced knowledge on current telecommunications and electronic systems and with the latest skills for their design & development. The course offers specialized services in the field of design and manufacturing of electronic devices, system management, installation, maintenance, repair in telecommunications which are well paid and offer excellent career growth opportunities.
corse.programOutcomesPera: Ability to identify, formulate and solve engineering problems in the broad areas like Systems Design using communication and networking platforms and tools. Explore recent developments in areas like optical communication, satellite communication, wireless communication, networking, RF-microwave, antennas, measurements and standards in communication. Ability to understand and use different software tools for Design, Analysis and Verification in the domain of communication and networking. System results are obtained through progressive steps such as Design entry, Synthesis, Functional and Timing Simulation. Ability to function as a member of a multi disciplinary team with sense of ethics, integrity and social responsibility.

corse.title: Master in Information Technology Engineering
corse.titlePera: Master of Engineering in Information Technology is a postgraduate degree course which spans 2 years and these 2 years are divided into 4 semesters.  Apply principles of mathematics, science, and engineering in a variety of contexts.  The major areas of focus in the course are the Research, development, designing, modifying and managing the software programs.     Identify, design, and analyze complex computer systems and implement and interpret the results from those systems.  Select and apply current techniques, skills, and tools necessary for computing practice and integrate IT-based solutions into the user environment effectively.
corse.programOutcomesPera: Develop an understanding of the currents trends in Information Technology and the modern aspects of digitalization. To identify, design, and analyze complex computer systems and implement and interpret the results from those systems. To select and apply current techniques, skills and tools necessary for computing practice and integrate IT-based solutions into the user environment effectively. To analyze the local and global impact of computing on individuals, organizations, and society. To apply ethical principles and responsibilities during professional practice.
corse.eligibilityCriteria: Graduate in Engineering with IT Engineering.

corse.title: Master in Mechanical Engineering
corse.titlePera: Masters in Mechanical Engineering is a two year course spanning over four semesters. It offers specialization in CAD/CAM. The course aims to impart the knowledge of design (designing) a product and program manufacturing process, specifically by CNC machining. The knowledge of CAM software helps to create various models and assemblies with the help of CAD software. The program offers development of skill in the area of analysis and its application to modern concepts of mechanical engineering. The student will learn techniques to manage projects and research activities, imparting highly desirable skills for working in industry.
corse.programOutcomesPera: To apply mechanical engineering education to address the full range of technical and societal problems with creativity, imagination, confidence and responsibility. To provide a sound understanding of advanced principles of computer aided design and manufacturing. To retain the intellectual curiosity that motivates lifelong learning and allows for a flexible response to the rapidly evolving challenges of 21st century.
corse.eligibilityCriteria: Graduate in Engineering with Automobile  Engineering.

corse.title: M.Sc. Chemistry
corse.titlePera: M.Sc. in Chemistry is a postgraduate two-year programme that is divided into four semesters. This Programme deal with study of matter, the composition, properties, and structure of substances. The discipline deals with compounds and elements that consist of molecules, atoms and ions. Advancements in chemistry have a great impact on the world which range from new medicines to new materials to new sources of energy
corse.programOutcomesPera: After successful completion of this course a student will be able to determine molecular structure by using UV, IR and NMR., Study of medicinal chemistry for lead compound, Synthesis of Natural products and drugs by using proper mechanisms, solve the reaction mechanisms and assign the final product. There are various higher study options available for candidates who have completed their PG in Chemistry. They can join various other PG and research courses related to the topic of interest such as Master of Philosophy in applies chemistry or basic chemistry. They can opt for Ph.D. in different fields of chemistry. The employment areas after this programme includes pharmaceutical industries, chemical manufactures, forensic science department, plastic industries, agro industries etc. Apart from these they are also recruited in the field such as oil, gas and power sectors, defence services.
corse.eligibilityCriteria: Bachelor's degree in relevant specialization from any recognized university.

laboratories.title: Chemistry Lab -1
laboratories.subTitle: Equipped with
laboratories.pera: Distilled water assembly/Weighing machine/Glass ware/Plastic ware/Chemicals

corse.title: M.Sc. Microbiology
corse.titlePera: M.Sc. in Microbiology is a postgraduate two-year programme that is divided into four semesters. These courses are concerned with the appearance, form (morphology), genetics, and metabolic processes of microscopic and sub-microscopic organisms. Microbiology is a relatively new discipline with practical implications in a variety of fields of human life, including medicine, agriculture, nutrition, biotechnology, and so more. Microbiology logistical challenges also improved as a result of the theoretical and functional accumulation of nuclear physics, cellular and molecular biology, and knowledge methods, resulting in the accelerated advancement of microbiology.
corse.programOutcomesPera: Since microbiology is involved in so many areas, career openings after completing the M.Sc. Microbiology course include medicine, pharmacy, dairy, industry, health science, water industry, agriculture, chemical technology, and nanotechnology. Students can also opt for Ph.D. in different fields of microbiology.
corse.eligibilityCriteria: Bachelor's degree in relevant specialization from any recognized university.

laboratories.title: Microbiology Lab -1
laboratories.subTitle: Equipped with
laboratories.pera: Autoclave,-incubator/shaker, -Binocular Microscope/Hot Air oven,-Centrifudge/Electro phoresis,-water bath/Ocullarmicrometer,-Colorimeter/Colony micrometer, Stage Micrometer

corse.title: M.Sc. Zoology
corse.titlePera: M.Sc. in Zoology is a postgraduate two-year programme that is divided into four semesters. This course deals with detailed study of variety of animals both living and extinct. The surface of Animals is also covered in study with other Animals, which are in the same manner the Basis of other Animals that live upon it. The discipline also deals with biological cells, sexual reproduction, nutrition and respiration and development of evolutionary theory.
corse.programOutcomesPera: Post graduation in zoology has many opportunities after completion. There are many fields of wildlife and their conservation, embryology, toxicology, pharmaceuticals, animal husbandry, ecosystem welfares, laboratories, marine science, wildlife photography, entomologist, ethnologists, cytologist, museum, Government hospitals, Government jobs in scientific officer, researchers, range forest officers as well as lots of opportunities of research based work opportunities and companies recruit various individuals for project of variety fields. Zoology course has a great future ahead. There are many universities providing further Ph.D. doctorate degree course in specialization which is career orienting and opens many jobs like academic career as well as researcher.
corse.eligibilityCriteria: Bachelor's degree in relevant specialization from any recognized university.

laboratories.title: Zoology Lab -1
laboratories.subTitle: Equipped with
laboratories.pera: Centrifuge/Student Microscope/Dissecting MIcroscope/Haemoglobin meter/Urinometer/Dissection Box/Microtome/Waterbath/Magneticstirrer

corse.title: M.Sc. Physics
corse.titlePera: M.Sc. in Physics is a postgraduate two-year program that is divided into four semesters. This course includes study of the structure of matter and the interactions between the fundamental constituents of the observable universe. This course deals with advance physics subject like Classical mechanics, Condensed matter physics, Quantum physics, statistical physics, mathematical physics, nuclear physics electronics, etc.
corse.programOutcomesPera: After completion of this course students have developed problem-solving and reasoning skills over time so these things help in considerably improve the chances of being hired in the research field. After completing a postgraduate degree in physics, students can opt for higher studies. They can go in the research field and pursue PhD in physics. After completing M.Sc. physics, various employment options become available in industrial field, defence field (DRDO) and technical field (ISRO) and teaching field in sciences.
corse.eligibilityCriteria: Bachelor's degree in relevant specialization from any recognized university.

laboratories.title: Physics Lab -1
laboratories.subTitle: Equipped with

corse.title: M.Sc. Mathematics
corse.titlePera: M.Sc. in Mathematics is a postgraduate two-year programme that is divided into four semesters. This course deals with deeper knowledge of advanced mathematics through a vast preference of subjects such as geometry, calculus, algebra, number theory, dynamical systems, and differential equations. This course also deals with learn process about how to collect mathematical data and how to analyse them with the help of different mathematical tools and methods.
corse.programOutcomesPera: After completing a postgraduate degree in Mathematics students can opt for higher studies. They can go in the research field and pursue PhD in mathematics and also can join jobs as a Chief Economist, as a Mathematician, as Statistician, as an Accountant, as Meteorologist in respective field. After completing M.Sc. Mathematics various employment options become available such as in defence filed (DRDO), in technical field (ISRO), in National Aeronautics Limited (NAL), in IBM and Microsoft, in teaching filed etc.
corse.eligibilityCriteria: Bachelor's degree in relevant specialization from any recognized university.

corse.title: M.Sc. Biotechnology
corse.titlePera: M.Sc. in Biotechnology is a postgraduate two-year programme that is divided into four semesters. These courses are concerned with science-based industry that uses living organisms and molecular biology to create healthcare products and therapeutics, as well as to run operations (such as DNA fingerprinting). Biotechnology is most known for its increasing importance in the realms of medicine and pharmaceuticals, but can also be used in genomics, food production, and other sectors.
corse.programOutcomesPera: The employment areas after this programme include pharmaceutical industries, healthcare, medicine, agriculture, food, environmental control and R&D in Biological Lab. Also Student can join for the various other PG and research courses related to the topic of interest i.e. PhD.
corse.eligibilityCriteria: Bachelor's degree in relevant specialization from any recognized university.

laboratories.title: Biotechnology Lab -1

corse.title: MBA in Financial Management
corse.titlePera: MBA in Finance specialization is for students who are good for analysis and reasoning skills. The finance department is one of the most important departments in a company, and finding an administrative job in it would be a great career move. MBA in Finance course trains students in making predictions and forecasts about investments and insurance. The course is designed in such a manner that the students gain theoretical as well as practical knowledge of financial components such as Investments, Portfolio Management, Financial Management, International Finance, and Corporate Finance.
corse.programOutcomesPera: To Attaining managerial/leadership roles as students gain in-depth knowledge in banking & finance./Students should be able to show analytical skills in short term and long term decision making./Get numerous jobs opportunities in this domain./The students acquire a professional qualification in banking, MNCs, International company etc./To get an idea of time value of money for any investment decision./It help to assess the capital structure of a firm and state its impact on firm’s profitability
corse.eligibilityCriteria: Candidates must have passed 10+2 or equivalent from a recognized board in India.

corse.title: Master of Commerce in Advance Accounting and auditing
corse.titlePera: Accounting is the process of analyzing, verifying and reporting the results of financial information to an organization, government agency or individual. we know accountancy as the primary and most sought after subject in the department of commerce. Students having qualification in this field have very good knowledge of monetary matters and are generally termed as accountants.  The study of accountancy also includes auditing and financial statements. The shareholders and investors need to know the truth about a company’s financial statement and that is why the job of an accountant matters the most. we know accountancy as the primary and most sought after subject in the department of commerce.

corse.title: Master of Commerce in Statistics
corse.titlePera: M.Com in Statistics is a postgraduate degree program, usually of 2 years, ideal for students looking to pursue a career in banking, finance, investment or accounting. It is a specialization course dealing with the subject area of statistics – the art and science of collecting and analyzing data to draw meaningful inferences. M.Com Statistics deals primarily with data analysis and interpretation and those who do this course will acquire the complete knowledge set of how to analyse data, which models to build, which tests to run, how to interpret it and finally, the practical applications for companies and governments alike.
corse.programOutcomesPera: Anyone pursuing this course will definitely develop the most important skill of analysis and logical reasoning. Other skills like data interpretation, critical reasoning, the ability to recognize patterns in a large set of data, testing appropriateness of parameters etc will automatically come as a part of the course/After completion of this course, a candidate will not only be eligible for a job in the banking and finance sector, but can also pursue professorship or join a consulting firm.
corse.eligibilityCriteria: Candidates who have passed Bachelors degree in relevant subjects from any recognized University are eligible.

Besides, there are periodicals, journals, weekly and monthly magazines, newspapers, considering the need to keep students abreast with latest development in the field of education, science and technology.

corse.title: Master of Computer Application
corse.titlePera: Postgraduate program in computer applications which seeks to impart within the students the most vital computer skills required to shape the course of the world with innovation and latest technology. the scope of technology has redefined the real life subsistence, thus making computer skills the most vital skillset of today’s era. masters in computer application program provides students with an in-depth specialisation into the scope of computer applications. The curriculum provides students with an exposure to the software aspects of computing which include Data Science, Artificial Intelligence, Internet of things, Cloud Computing, Security and Networking. The faculty is equipped with state of the art research facilities and laboratories which allow students to innovate and research solutions for the betterment of the society.
corse.programOutcomesPera: Ability to analyze, design and implement effective software, computing systems with the latest available technologies by applying the basic knowledge of computing science, mathematics and software engineering./Students will have the ability to test, deploy and analyze the quality of component based systems and to integrate them with the aim to develop a quality software system./Ability to exhibit knowledge of diverse software engineering practices and project management and can work on interdisciplinary projects as a team leader/team member in developing software of interdisciplinary nature.
corse.eligibilityCriteria: The candidate shall have passed the Graduation with minimum of 50% marks (45% marks for SC/ST/SEBC) provided that a candidate shall have passed the HSCE

Besides, there are periodicals, journals, weekly and monthly magazines, newspapers, considering the need to keep students abreast with latest development in the field of education, science and technology.

corse.title: Bachelor of Education
corse.titlePera: B.Ed is the bachelor’s degree undertaken to take up teaching as a profession in schools. To pursue this course one needs to have completed his/her graduation. According to the new norms of NCTE 2014, the B.Ed. program will be of two years which includes a total of four semesters. This is a full time regular course. In which the trainee is required to attend the college as per the rules. A Bachelor of Education is an undergraduate professional degree which prepares students for work as a teacher in schools.
corse.programOutcomesPera: B.Ed is a professional course and right after completing this course, students can get a job at school level. However, it may be noted those who wish to be become school teachers of senior secondary classes need to have a post-graduation degree before pursuing B.Ed.
corse.eligibilityCriteria: Students who have passed graduation degree of the pattern 10+2+3 from any U.G.C recognized university/post graduate degree

corse.title: Master of Education
corse.titlePera: Master of Education is a master degree course that deals with the study of new methods of teaching and educational research. The programme focuses on different aspects of education including instruction, curriculum, counselling, leadership, and educational technology. The regulatory body in charge of the Med M.Ed programme is the National Council of Higher Education.
corse.programOutcomesPera: The syllabus of M.Ed lays emphasis on different pedagogy of learning techniques that help candidates develop the right technical finesse to become an educator. The course curriculum of M.Ed not only includes theory but also a great amount of practical work. As part of the practical experience, candidates are encouraged to prepare dissertations, join internships, pursue academic writing, and attend workshops and seminars.
corse.eligibilityCriteria: The candidate, who has completed B.Ed. from UGC recognized university and NCTE recognized college, will be eligible for getting admission./Admission will be given on the basis of the percentage of marks obtained in compulsory papers of All semester in B.Ed. Therefore only one merit list will be prepared and faculty wise seat allocation will not be there. For old students, only compulsory paper’s marks will be considered for merit list.

corse.title: Master of Social work ( MSW)
corse.titlePera: Full form of MSW is Master of Social Work. MSW is a post-graduation course in the field of Social Work which is usually of two years duration. Aspirants can pursue MSW course after pursuing a Bachelor’s degree. Candidates who have pursued a Bachelor of Social Work (BSW) degree are preferred if they opt to pursue a post-graduation course in social work. The career in social work is all about giving and helping others in need. From various NGOs (non-government organisations) across the nation to social development, a master’s in social work will provide a candidate an in-depth knowledge about the work put into the development of humanity and social welfare.
corse.programOutcomesPera: To inculcate in students how to integrate knowledge of social work profession and current social welfare structures , Policies, Issues , and develop ability to analyze it impact upon client system, Human Service agencies and Communities./To prepare students for ethical decision-makingguided by the values, principles & standards of the social work profession, particularly the values of self-determination, empowerment, & regard for diversity./To Apply critical thinking skillsin problem solving with social work values and ethics, human diversity issues, the dynamics of discrimination and oppression, social and economic justice, and interactions among systems./Understands and responds to problems of individuals, families and groups.  Able to develop working relationship with the agency, client system, staff, colleagues and others in the field.

programOutcomesImages.name: Project Officers in Govt. & Voluntary Organisations

corse.eligibilityCriteria: A candidate should have passed in the Bachelor’s degree examination from UGC recognized University

corse.title: Diploma in Medical Laboratory Technology (DMLT)
corse.titlePera: Diploma in Medical Laboratory Technology (DMLT) is a one – year programme that includes eight month Theory, Practical and four month Internship. The course lays a foundation into the aspects of the technologies that are integrated into the healthcare system, which aims in improving the quality of the healthcare system. Diploma in Medical Laboratory Technology (DMLT) concentrates on imparting a thorough knowledge of the diagnosis treatment and prevention of diseases through the use of clinical laboratory Equipment.
corse.programOutcomesPera: After the completion of these course students will be able to perform medical tests with the help of medical instruments and the treatment of diseases, this program also equips candidates with the knowledge and skills required to handle the advanced lab equipment and perform accurate medical laboratory tests.
corse.eligibilityCriteria: BSc pass with Microbiology, Chemistry, Biochemistry, Zoology, Botany, Biotechnology, Life Science
